title: Increase Talent Density
summary: Focus on hiring and retaining only top performers to create a high-performing culture.

details.content: A team composed of highly talented individuals raises the overall standard, drives innovation, and increases productivity. Mediocre performers can lower morale and slow progress.
Netflix implemented the 'keeper test,' where managers regularly assess if they would fight to keep an employee. If not, they offer a generous severance package to maintain high talent density.

content: Offer generous severance to those who are not a strong fit.

title: Promote Candid Feedback
summary: Foster a culture where employees give and receive honest, constructive feedback frequently.

details.content: Candid feedback helps individuals and teams improve rapidly, prevents misunderstandings, and builds trust. It ensures issues are addressed before they escalate.
Netflix encourages employees to give feedback directly and in real time, using the '4A' feedback model: Aim to Assist, Actionable, Appreciate, Allow for Acceptance or Discard.

content: Give feedback regularly, not just during reviews.
Receive feedback with openness and gratitude.
Model feedback by leaders and managers.

title: Remove Controls
summary: Eliminate unnecessary rules and approval processes to empower employees and increase agility.

details.content: Fewer controls allow for faster decision-making, greater ownership, and increased innovation. Excessive rules can stifle creativity and slow progress.
Netflix famously removed its vacation policy and travel approvals, trusting employees to act in the company’s best interest.

content: Trust employees to make responsible decisions.

title: Lead with Context, Not Control
summary: Leaders provide the necessary information and context for decision-making, rather than micromanaging.

details.content: When employees understand the bigger picture, they can make better decisions independently. This increases engagement and speeds up execution.
Netflix leaders share strategic goals, market data, and financials openly so employees can align their decisions with company objectives.

content: Share relevant information openly and frequently.
Empower employees to act on their understanding.

title: Encourage Innovation
summary: Create an environment where experimentation is valued and failure is seen as a learning opportunity.

details.content: Innovation drives growth and keeps the company competitive. A culture that tolerates risk-taking and learning from mistakes enables breakthrough ideas.
Netflix encourages employees to try new approaches, even if they might fail, and celebrates learning from unsuccessful experiments.

content: Provide time and resources for creative projects.
